body: Hello Everyone! I have currently applied for Media. I really hope I get it, but in the meantime, how's everyones day? If you ask, my day is GREAT. Well, you guys wanna hear a funny meme? "Samba was walking to slow so Nala Says to Moo Fasa" xD Bye guys!
